interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  333  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " War's End "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first weekday on or after Day 333.

progression.synopsis: Ami shows Maya and Sensei her new uniform. After she has gone, Maya tells Sensei that another reset is coming. She says that it will be the first time a single "iteration" of Sensei has lasted long enough to see a third reset, and that if he wants to avoid non-existence, he should focus on staying who and where he is. Her suggestion of killing Noriko doesn't appeal to him, so she suggests that he "just do things normally again". She tells him that she will be waiting for him on the roof, just like always.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .18p2.
